backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining lesson, practice problem, and progress types with initialization functions for fractions and decimals lessons, plus data storage maps for lessons, problems, and user progress.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old lesson records (without topic field) to new lesson records (with topic field) by mapping lesson IDs to default topics.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features for lesson browser and lesson detail page verification with associated test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components including pages, hooks, and UI components with descriptions of their functionality and mainnet deployment considerations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including primary, secondary, accent, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with production-ready meta tags, theme color, Inter font preloading, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes including home, lessons, practice area, progress tracking, and practice mode session routes with Layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AchievementBadge: Achievement badge component displaying achievement text with dynamically selected badge images based on achievement type, including error handling for missing images.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component wrapping all pages with Navigation header and footer containing copyright and Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/LessonCard.tsx: Reusable lesson card component displaying lesson title, difficulty stars, topic badge with emoji, content preview, and hover effects for navigation to lesson details.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Main navigation component with sticky header, logo, nav links (Home, Lessons, Practice, Practice Mode, Progress), and Internet Identity authentication dropdown menu.
Displays a single practice problem with input field, submit/reset buttons, and feedback UI showing correct/incorrect results with themed messages.
frontend/src/components/PracticeSessionH: Sticky header for practice sessions displaying topic name, progress counter (problems completed/total), and elapsed time with timer hook.
frontend/src/components/ProgressDashboar: Dashboard displaying user progress stats (lessons completed, streak, average score), motivational messages, achievements grid, and practice history list.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, handling authentication state changes and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompleteLesson.ts: Mutation hook to mark a lesson as completed via the backend actor and invalidate progress queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flows, and identity state with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useLessons.ts: Query hook to fetch all lessons from the backend actor, enabled only when actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeProblems.t: Query hook to fetch all practice problems from the backend actor, enabled only when actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeProblemsBy: Query hook to fetch practice problems filtered by topic from the backend actor, enabled when actor and topic are available.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeSessionTim: Timer hook that tracks elapsed seconds in a practice session and formats time as MM:SS string.
frontend/src/hooks/useProgress.ts: Query hook to fetch user progress data from the backend actor, enabled only when actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitPracticeScor: Mutation hook to submit a practice problem score to the backend and invalidate progress queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitPracticeSess: Mutation hook to record a complete practice session to the backend and invalidate progress queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a neon green color scheme for light and dark modes, plus base styles for typography using Inter font.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards, and CTAs using Gen-Z slang; displays login/start learning buttons based on authentication state and showcases app benefits.
frontend/src/pages/LessonBrowser.tsx: Displays filterable list of math lessons organized by topics (fractions, algebra, geometry, etc.) with loading states, error handling, and retry functionality for backend canister connection.
frontend/src/pages/LessonDetail.tsx: Shows individual lesson content with formatted markdown rendering, topic badges, difficulty stars, and a completion button that marks lessons as complete via backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeArea.tsx: Practice problem interface with navigation between problems, progress tracking, loading/error states, and displays individual practice problems using the PracticeProblem component.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeModePage.tsx: Topic selection page displaying eight math topics (fractions, decimals, percentages, etc.) as clickable cards with icons and Gen-Z descriptions, routing to topic-specific practice sessions.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeSessionPage.t: Main practice session page that displays problems for a given topic, tracks user answers, manages navigation between problems, and handles session completion with timer tracking and submission to backend.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeSessionSummar: Displays practice session results including accuracy, problems attempted, duration, and motivational messages; submits session data to backend and provides options to retry or return to topic selection.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressTracking.tsx: Progress tracking page that requires Internet Identity authentication to display user's learning progress dashboard, with loading states and error handling for backend connectivity.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended border radius values, custom animations, and typography/container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata file tracking features, requirements, and architectural state for a math learning app with brainrot themes for middle schoolers (appears to contain legacy alto-singing tutor feature descriptions).
